# VisualShaderNodeCurveTexture

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeResizableBase](class_visualshadernoderesizablebase.md) **<** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Performs a [CurveTexture](class_curvetexture.md) lookup within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Comes with a built-in editor for texture's curves.
